## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                            | Type      | Default         |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------- |

| `showOverlay` | `show-overlay` |                                        | `boolean` | `false`         |
| `siteName`    | `site-name`    | The na that is displayed in the header | `string`  | `'Application'` |
